summary: Displays the provided values into the editor console.
description:
This block displays the given values into the editor console.
The Severity setting allows to specify the error level of the result message.
This block is dynamic thus the input data count can be changed using the block configuration dialog.
The data port handles all value types.

dataPorts.Value1: the value to be displayed into the editor console.

controlPorts.Out: is activated when the process is completed.

settings.Severity: the error level of the result message. Value can be <doc-value translate=no>eInfo</doc-value>, <doc-value translate=no>eWarning</doc-value>, <doc-value translate=no>eDebug</doc-value>, <doc-value translate=no>eError</doc-value> or <doc-value translate=no>eSuccess</doc-value>.
